properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) LISTCOUNT FROM TB_MEMBER WHERE ADMIN_YN='N'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , A.* FROM ( SELECT MEM_NO , MEM_ID , MEM_PWD , MEM_NAME , MEM_ADDRESS , MEM_PHONE , EMAIL , EMAIL_YN , ENROLL_ROUTE , ENROLL_DATE , RECENT_LOGIN , ADMIN_YN ,(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_MEM_COUPON C WHERE C.COU_YN = 'N' AND C.MEM_NO_COU = MEM_NO) AS "couCnt" ,(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_ORDER O WHERE O.MEM_NO_OR = MEM_NO ) AS "orderCnt" ,NVL((SELECT SUM(OR_SUM) FROM TB_ORDER O WHERE O.MEM_NO_OR = MEM_NO ),'0') AS "orderTotalAmt" FROM TB_MEMBER ORDER BY MEM_NO DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
